startPMB

public void startPMB(android.content.Context context,
                     UDID UDID_Impl)
              throws PMBException
Description copied from interface: PMB
Starts the PushMeBaby Service. It should be the first thing that gets called. This method is called with no username so the username would be set as undefined at the PushMeBaby Server.

Specified by:
startPMB in interface PMB
Parameters:
context - the context of the Application
UDID_Impl - the own implementation of the UDID class. If it is zero, the default implementation is used
Throws:
PMBException - this class is the main class for all Exceptions.You can get the ErrorText with .getErrorText or you grab, with .getException, the real Exception e.g. JSONException an print the Stack for example

startPMB

public void startPMB(android.content.Context context,
                     UDID UDID_Impl,
                     java.lang.String user)
              throws PMBException
Description copied from interface: PMB
Starts the PushMeBaby Service. It should be the first thing that gets called. This method is called with the username so the username would be set as the given name at the PushMeBaby Server.

Specified by:
startPMB in interface PMB
Parameters:
context - the context of the Application
UDID_Impl - the own implementation of the UDID class. If it is zero, the default implementation is used
user - The username
Throws:
PMBException - this class is the main class for all Exceptions.You can get the ErrorText with .getErrorText or you grab, with .getException, the real Exception e.g. JSONException an print the Stack for example

Description copied from interface: PMB
Sets the tags for an specified device. These method returns a boolean value. For this value you have to implement the TagListener.
